user_input: Please create hourly Electricity demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Generate hourly electricity demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios using NT, NT_HE, and NT_LE scenarios and the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', generate demand profiles using NT, NT_HE, and NT_LE scenarios for the specified years.

tasks.description: Split the nodes as specified in the input scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', identify and split the relevant nodes accordingly.

tasks.description: Convert the generated hourly demand profiles into TST format for the TYNDP study team.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', format the demand profiles into the standard TST workbook.
